text: Michel Feron (13 May 1923 - 18 May 2014) was a Belgian alpine skier. He competed at the 1948 Winter Olympics and the 1952 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Belgian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Belgium Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:People from Vilvoorde
title: Michel Feron
